languages.text: История банды анверов завершилась. Но странное пророчество ее главаря внушает тревогу...
The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...
languages.original_text: История банды анверов завершилась. Но странное пророчество ее главаря внушает тревогу...

traits.locale_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

languages.text: 安维尔帮已经不复存在，但帮派头目临死前的古怪预言却令人忧心忡忡……
languages.original_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

traits.locale_text: 安维尔帮已经不复存在，但帮派头目临死前的古怪预言却令人忧心忡忡……

languages.text: アンヴァースギャングの話は終わったが、このリーダーが残した予言じみた言葉が懸念を呼び覚ます…
languages.original_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

traits.locale_text: アンヴァースギャングの話は終わったが、このリーダーが残した予言じみた言葉が懸念を呼び覚ます…

languages.text: La historia de la banda de los Anvers ha llegado a su fin, pero la misteriosa profecía de su líder es preocupante...
languages.original_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

traits.locale_text: La historia de la banda de los Anvers ha llegado a su fin, pero la misteriosa profecía de su líder es preocupante...

languages.text: Die Geschichte der Anvers-Bande ist vorbei. Aber die seltsame Prophezeiung ihres Anführers gibt Anlass zur Sorge ...
languages.original_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

traits.locale_text: Die Geschichte der Anvers-Bande ist voorbei. Aber die seltsame Prophezeiung ihres Anführers gibt Anlass zur Sorge ...

languages.text: L'histoire du gang des Anver a pris fin. Mais l'étrange prophétie de son chef reste inquiétante...
languages.original_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

traits.locale_text: L'histoire du gang des Anver a pris fin. Mais l'étrange prophétie de son chef reste inquiétante...

languages.text: Anver çetesinin hikâyesi sona ermiş olsa da liderinin tuhaf kehaneti düşündürücü.
languages.original_text: The story of the Anvers gang is over. But its leader's strange prophecy is cause for concern...

traits.locale_text: Anverlar çetesinin hikâyesi sona ermiş olsa da liderinin tuhaf kehaneti düşündürücü.
